page.title: 19WORKERS FROM DAVIOT.
page.content:
My dad works for the Forestry Commission in Inverness.He is a mechanic.My mum cleans Daviot School.
My dad works at MacDermotts. Dad drives there. My dad's name is John Macleod. My mum drives the school taxi and takes the children to school. My Dad is a farmer.He is in partnership with his brother.Mum used to be a teacher but not now. She is a house wife now.Mum does Bed and breakfast in the summer. My dad works at the Highlands and Islands Development Board (known as the H.I.D.B.) in Inverness.My mum teaches Gaelic, the language of the Scottish Highlands.She teaches in three schools in Inverness. My dad travels about a lot and writes lots of letters.
